stimulusHtml: An atom or ion of lithium has 3 protons in its nucleus. Which of the following describes how a lithium ion with a net charge of +2e could be obtained from a neutral lithium atom?
choicesHtml: Remove two electrons from a neutral lithium atom.
Add two electrons to a neutral lithium atom.
Add two protons to a neutral lithium atom.
Remove one electron and add one proton to a neutral lithium atom.
